title: Our favorite MacBook Air is down to an all-time-low of just $849 right now
content:
Macworld

It’s hard not to recommend the light and powerful M4 MacBook Air. It’s nearly impossible not to recommend it when it’s at an all-time low price. Amazon is selling the M4 MacBook Air for $849 right now, a fantastic savings of $150.

The M4 MacBook Air is a super-sleek laptop built around a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina Display that delivers bright, vibrant colors whether you’re working in an office or on the patio. The laptop is powered by the speedy M4 chip and 16GB of memory, more than enough to handle a full day of work and play. It also comes with 256GB of storage, but the Thunderbolt 4 port will let you connect a speedy drive if you run out of space.

We gave this laptop a rare 5-star rating and our Editors’ Choice award, calling it “a laptop for everyone” due to its great price, powerful processor, and gorgeous design. And at $150 off at Amazon, we know you’re going to love it too.
